title: Hogwarts Legacy DELAYED (w/ Jirard the Completionist) - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.12.22
description:
Go to http://chime.com/KFGAMES to get started with Chime today.

Go to http://meundies.com/kindafunny to get 20% off your first order plus free shipping.

Tim reunites with Jirard Khalil to breakdown the Harry Potter delay, Xbox giving PlayStation unsolicited advice, Kojima's PT 8 year anniversary, and more!

Follow Jirard at https://twitter.com/Completionist

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:05 - Housekeeping
Are you ready to rumble? Friday, we're doing a sponsored Rumbleverse stream with a buncha guests from Iron Galaxy to talk about the launch of their brawler royale! Come play with Greg and Mike in private Kinda Funny matches after KFGD at 11 am PT!
The Roper Report  -
00:03:26 - Hogwarts Legacy DELAYED
00:08:17 - Microsoft Snarkily Schools Sony On How To Better Run PS Plus
00:13:17 - Sega Has No Plans To Delay Sonic Frontiers From Its 2022 Launch
00:21:53 - Ad
00:23:59 - MultiVersus Season 1 Plans Locked In
00:32:37 - OwlBoy Developer’s Announce Their Next Project
00:36:33 - Hideo Kojima Marks The 8-Year Anniversary Of PT
00:39:47 - Veteran Resident Evil Producer Has Left Capcom to Join NetEase
00:41:44 - Gotham Knights Lore Building
00:45:03 - Out today
00:46:00 - You‘re Wrong
00:46:42 - Squad Up! kfdatabase.com
00:48:45 - God of Work
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday - Bless & Tim
Tuesday - Tim & Bless
Wednesday - Bless & Whitta
Thursday - Bless & ???
Friday - Tim & Bless

uh story number seven here a veteran resident evil producer has left capcom to join netease this comes from ryan dinsdale at ign a veteran capcom producer who worked on several resident evil games is leaving the company after 27 years to join chinese mobile game developer and tech firm netease games hiroyoki kobayashi announced the career shift in a tweet in which he confirmed his new role as a producer at netease and said more details would follow at a later date quote after serving 27 years with gratitude i've departed from capcom on march 31st 2022 and will officially be joining netease games as a producer kobayashi said i will strive to continuously create more enjoyable entertainment experiences for everyone at this new company in this new era he started at copcom in 95 and was a programmer on the first two resident evil games a planner for the original dino crisis a producer on the original devil may cry he was also a producer on resident evil remake resident evil 4 killer 7 and
